attributes.action: Support the re-opening of Park Run
attributes.additional_details: It will improve thousands of UK citizens physical & mental health.
attributes.background: Whilst many landowners and Local Authorities have agreed to give permission to restart on June 5th many have not.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about approving local events are a matter for indiviudal local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

If you are concerned about your own local authority's approach to park runs, you could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
